(font-weight: 400) Meetyl was commercialized in 2013 by a team of experienced managers with backgrounds in Equity Research, Institutional Equity Sales, and Investment Management with the goal of providing an expansive platform to facilitate communications within the financial services community. We believe that the financial services industry is in the midst of tremendous secular change and that putting companies, investors, and industry contacts in touch with each other can be done in a much more transparent, targeted and cost-efficient manner. We are complemented in our efforts by our software development team with a strong background in design and implementation of reciprocal filtering technology.
(font-weight: 300) Meetyl was commercialized in 2013 by a team of experienced managers with backgrounds in Equity Research, Institutional Equity Sales, and Investment Management with the goal of providing an expansive platform to facilitate communications within the financial services community. We believe that the financial services industry is in the midst of tremendous secular change and that putting companies, investors, and industry contacts in touch with each other can be done in a much more transparent, targeted and cost-efficient manner. We are complemented in our efforts by our software development team with a strong background in design and implementation of reciprocal filtering technology.
